nodes.text: The Pitareeze family was a family from Kalarba that owned and operated Kalarba Safari.

When C-3PO and R2-D2 escaped from IG-88B's stolen ship via a lifepod, they landed in a lake next to the family, which was eating a picnic at the time. The droids introduced themselves and offered to help the family at their factory.
It is unknown whether the grandfather in Star Wars: Droids Special 1 was the father of Jarth or Meg. Nak only identifies him as "Baron" and "Grandfather."
